List of all members.

Detailed Description

The base class of all dialogs.

This class can not be instancied. You must use InfoDialog and others subclass or make your own subclass.

A dialog can have up to 3 buttons. It can show a title and a message.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::draw (  )  [pure virtual]

The pure virtual draw method.

This method must be subclassed. To draw a standard dialog, it must call the drawDialog() protected method.

Implemented in RainbruRPG::Terminal::InfoDialog.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawButtons (  )  [private]
